The start-up project

The start-up project

Before implementing something you should first understand on what kind of project you’re gonna work. In my experience I’ve managed to delimit a couple of types.

1) The enterprise project 2) The start-up project 3) The personal project 4) The internal project

Each project type is different and requires different type of thinking and analysis.

Let’s start with the ** ENTERPRISE PROJECT **
